member.name: M:ARWNI2S.Infrastructure.Extensions.EnumerableExtensions.EnumerableToString``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0},System.Func{``0,System.String},System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns a human-readable text string that describes an IEnumerable collection of objects.
member.typeparam: The type of the list elements.
member.returns: A string assembled by wrapping the string descriptions of the individual elements with square brackets and separating them with commas.
